MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Falcon Avenue and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm due to safety concerns onsite and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:56pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
